page.title: 08LIFE STYLES cont
page.content: something with it so I listened to the radio instead.At 8:45 I put on my coat got my bag and went to school.When the bell rang,we sat down and Mrs Tallontire marked the register. We went into the hall to Assembly and sang,"Oh Praise".Mr Clifford talked .Then we said our prayers.After Assembly we did spellings.After break we did maths till dinnertime when we had beefburgers, potatoes and spaghetti and for pudding we had plums and custard.After break we did Singing Together.Then we went for a walk.I had to draw a picture of Boxwood House. When we came back from the walk it was time for home.I went into the hall for Brownies.We sang the Brownie song and then we went outside and played cat and mouse.At 7:30 I went to bed.
